feature.label: org.w3c.doc.feature
feature.description: A collection of W3C specification documents. Note that these are for informational purpose only. Visit http://www.w3c.org to access the original documents.
feature.license: The plugin itself is licensed under Eclipse Public License. The content is licensed as http://www.w3.org/Consortium/Legal/2002/copyright-documents-20021231.
